name: Lorem_paragraphsTest
description: Unit tests for the Lorem class's paragraphs method.

test_cases.name: testParagraphsWithCount
test_cases.description: Tests the paragraphs method with a positive count, ensuring the returned list has the correct size and each paragraph is not blank.

test_cases.name: testParagraphsWithZeroCount
test_cases.description: Tests the paragraphs method with a zero count, ensuring the returned list is empty.

test_cases.name: testParagraphsWithNegativeCount
test_cases.description: Tests the paragraphs method with a negative count, ensuring the returned list is empty after adjusting the count to zero using Math.max.
